snippet: ROSEFSKY--Julie F.,on June 6, 2016. Beloved wife of Steven. Devoted mother of Maya Hope and Eli James. Loving daughter of Allen and Marcia Fergang. Dear sister of Caryl Spector and Yale Fergang. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROSEFSKY--Julie F.,on June 6, 2016. Beloved wife of Steven. Devoted mother of Maya Hope and Eli James. Loving daughter of Allen and Marcia Fergang. Dear sister of Caryl Spector and Yale Fergang. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROSEFSKY, JULIE F.
